column4: E: ggzd: subprocess post-installation script returned error exit status 134, know what this means?
the script that runs after the files in the package have been moved into the filesystem failed

depending on what the script was supposed to do, it may not even matter, you would want to take a look at the script, should be in /var/apt somewhere iirc, and go from there. There is no "you do this for sure" kind of answer to this, it depends on the package.
